title: Understanding investor sentiment through the Bitcoin leverage ratio
description:
The estimated leverage ratio for Bitcoin futures, defined as the ratio of the open interest in futures contracts to the balance of the corresponding exchange, is a barometer for gauging the degree of leverage that traders employ in their positions. Analyzing this ratio, especially for a high-volatility asset like Bitcoin, provides invaluable insights into the […]

The post Understanding investor sentiment through the Bitcoin leverage ratio appeared first on CryptoSlate.

description: In a recent public service announcement, Bitcoin Core developer Luke Dashjr alerted the Bitcoin community to a vulnerability within the Bitcoin Core software. title: Ark Invest sells significant holdings in Coinbase and Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
description: In a recent development, Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest has made substantial divestments from its holdings in Coinbase and Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) shares. The investment firm reportedly sold 237,572 COIN shares, valued at approximately $33.3 million, and 168,127 GBTC shares, amounting to around $5.9 million, on Tuesday. These moves come amidst ongoing price surges in ... Read more

title: FDUSD Hits $1B Market Cap as Binance Ceases Support for BUSD
description:

This achievement follows Binance’s announcement of transitioning from BUSD to FDUSD, a new contender in the largest exchange stablecoin arena. In an official press release on […]

title: Banking Giant Societe Generale Says It Has Issued First ‘Digital Green Bond’ on Ethereum (ETH) Network
description:
One of the largest banks in France says it has issued the first-ever digital green bond as a security token on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain.
